meta.title: Toppin - Discover the community where you'll find your sweet match
meta.description: Join Toppin, the dating app that connects you with your soulmate. Discover a vibrant community where you'll find your sweet match and live unique experiences.

hero.title: The sweetest dating app
hero.subtitle: Discover the community where you'll find your sweet match

phoneShowcase.title: Swipe to find your sweet match
phoneShowcase.description1: Discover Toppin and meet the best people in your city.
phoneShowcase.description2: Join and add flavor to your life!

features.title: What makes us So sweet?
features.subtitle: Everyone loves sweets. That's why our users love our community of sweet matches.
features.feature1: For more appetizing experiences, we encourage you to verify your profile. Although they're not the only ones, verified sweet matches are the tastiest in the box!
features.feature2: Don't waste your time on people who aren't worth it. Join Toppin and start meeting interesting people right now.
features.feature3: Use Donuts, Muffins and Gummy Bears to get more dates, because... Who doesn't like a sweet treat?

game.title: Play and meet people
game.description1: Discover a new way to meet people.
game.description2: Play Toppin so you don't miss any dates with people in your area.
game.description3: Use Donuts, Muffins and Gummy Bears to get more dates, because... Who doesn't like a sweet treat?

testimonials.title: Sweet Match
testimonials.testimonial1: On other apps I couldn't find anyone interesting or kind. The toppin community is great.
testimonials.testimonial2: I started using toppin last week and I've already had two dates.
testimonials.testimonial3: It's a great app, you get to meet people by playing. Very fun.
testimonials.testimonial4: Using Toppin I met my partner. He sent me a muffin and I couldn't resist.
testimonials.testimonial5: Before, it took me a long time to find someone to have an interesting conversation with. Now, it's very easy to find people who are worth it.
